item.description:
Energy - How does it flow? How can energy be used to heal? What are some of the
types that are available for daily use? We will cover basic descriptions of mental,
physical, and spiritual energies.  We will cover different types of energy modalities, such as Reiki, Acupuncture, Thermography, Emotional Release Technique, Breathwork, Movement & Meditation. We will cover how the mind can either assist or hinder the process.   At the end of the night, you will be able to identify things that block the flow of energy & you will learn some tools to increase your flow of energy. Knowledge is Empowering.

Payments will be accepted on Paypal and on the evening of the Meetup at the HSCCenter.
item.how_to_find_us: Murphy Drive is located off of Northeastern Blvd in Nashua, NH

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Energy Medicine
